availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard W. Watkins (Mason County, Kentucky, grocer)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, grocer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Watkins. Father of Anne E. Watkins, Sarah B. Watkins, Caroline F. Watkins, Isaac Watkins, Nancy Watkins, William Watkins, Richard Watkins, [unknown] Watkins. Grocer in Mason County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville District No. 1, p. 50A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville Ward No 4, p. 441B, 442A.
